description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take control of Mr. horse who is trying to pay for his gambling debts by selling some cattle he found.  Use dynamite to tame the wilderness and collect hay with your cattle. Get as many as you can to the end of each level to cash in as many points as possible!
description.short: Take control of Mr. horse who is trying to pay for his gambling debts by selling some cattle he found.  Use dynamite to tame the wilderness and collect hay with your cattle. Get as many as you can to the end of each level to cash in as many points as possible!
